##

$$ \begin{aligned} f(x)&= 3x^2+5x &&B(-1|f(-1))
f(x)&= 3x^2+5x &&B(-1|-2)
fâ€™(x)&= 6x + 5&&
\mathclap{\rule{2cm}{0.4pt}}
Y_t&=m_tx+b
\mathclap{\rule{2cm}{0.4pt}}
fâ€™(x)&=m_t; &&fâ€™(x)=6x+5
fâ€™(-1)&=6(-1)+5=-6=m_t
\mathclap{\rule{2cm}{0.4pt}}
-2&=6*-1+5+b; &&b=-1 \end{aligned} $$

Normale

$$ \begin{aligned} Y_n&=m_nx+c&&
m_n&=-\frac{1}{m_t}
m_n&=-\frac{1}{-1}=1
-2 &= 1(-1)+c &&\vert +1
-1&=c \end{aligned} $$
